segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must not have heard the water running over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she hasn't noticed the children yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being quite bold, standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's ever fallen off it before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's cheering him on, which is cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be shocked when she sees the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is really starting to spread, it's going to be a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the scene looks overall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and catches the children in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
